nodes.text: B6-24 was a protocol droid with feminine programming who hosted Droid Station Frequency 3-7-6-4-3-7, a classified radio station where droids helped droids. The station played in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu.
B6-24 was created for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019. The droid is not present in the park, but her voice can be heard in certain areas.
